website_summaries.verdict: Though you have to purchase lids separately, this set of 2 pans is a solid deal for the price and the versatility they offer for a variety of cooking needs.
pros: Two square pans – 9 and 9.5 inches – with sturdy handles
Versatile sizes are perfect for numerous dishes and various portion sizes
cons: While some owners are impressed with how easy they clean up, others report sticking

customer_reviews.title: Lives UpTo Its Hype!!
customer_reviews.text: I never watch infomercials but I was trapped in the hospital and couldn't reach the remote, so I watched this one. I thought "yeah, right." But I was intrigued enough to order a piece. I have since given away all my previous cookware and replaced it with Copper Chef!! This cookware lives up to its hype. I wish I could have had it 40 years ago!! Maybe I'll change my mind about infomercials!
customer_reviews.author: N. D. Beier

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: Great Pan's! I have had these over a year and are holding up great. Non stick is awesome 👌. If you use only plastic with them and don't abuse them by cooling them down by running water on them, the should last a long time..
customer_reviews.author: Jethro.. 😎

customer_reviews.title: Awful, dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I had heard great things about these copper pans. They work at first but it doesnt take long before they become trash. Everything sticks to them and then black stuff ends up staying on them because you cant clean them. Our pans before a year went in the trash. Find something else!
customer_reviews.author: JK218

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: i love all the copper chef cookware...have given many pieces to family for gifts...they love them as much as i do...i have burnt sauce in pan and thought that I would have to discard it because it was so bad...let it soak and then tried to clean it with a sponge scrubber...to my surprise...it came clean and you can't tell it from a newer pan I have
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Best skillets ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these skillets...from the square design to the non stick! I have fried in them, baked in them, etc. Possibilities are endless. Made the best cornbread I ever had..no crumbling, no mess, used plastic knife to slice and pulled out with fingers. Can't say enough good about them! They are now my go-to skillets. Caution...read the instructions..do not use cooking spray. Make sure to season pans before use.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Oh
customer_reviews.text: Everything you cook slides right out of the pan. Perfect. Oh! It is a square pan on a round burner and somehow, it distributes the heat evenly on the bottom of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Momo4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small family or single person cooking
customer_reviews.text: We use these pans almost every day. Perfect size for small family or single person cooking. Works as advertised. No more messy pans. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the sizes but would have preferred one be deeper
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sizes but would have preferred one be deeper. Also I prefer lids!! I gave as gifts and have these pans in all sizes. They are the best, easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Sanddollar

customer_reviews.title: How it fit
customer_reviews.text: I use the 8 inch for omelets and it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you expect it be nonstick for then a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: The worst nonstick skillet we have ever owned would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Riley

customer_reviews.title: Pans are small, do not come with lids ,but pretty good deal
customer_reviews.text: Pans can as described,kinda wish they were bigger/the deep square pan I bought a year ago from copper chef.ALSO!NO LIDS,makes me very sad 😮 other than that,I am happy with the price .
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Easy, easy...
customer_reviews.text: If you like to or don't like to cook, you can't go wrong with ALL of the copper products. Best thing is no need clean up. Will never stick. VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Food seems to stick, so have to watch temperature (fault of the cook!). However, clean up was a cinch!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pans! Takes a little getting use to the square shape! Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Stuff slips right out Love making my eggs in
customer_reviews.text: Stuff slips right out Love making my eggs in them
customer_reviews.author: RUSSELL JAIME AUERBACH

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Candy Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Received them damaged, and were of such LOW Quality sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: pepenikos

customer_reviews.title: Fry pans
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to cook for one or two. It takes some care...not being able to cook with olive oil is a real difficulty. Otherwise, very nice set.
customer_reviews.author: David Love

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first few uses. but not after..
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. McLeish

customer_reviews.title: They were all for gifts and everyone was pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: They were all for gifts and everyone was pleased with them, I purchased 5 and would like to get one more if still available at the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Nothing sticks. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Velia D. Peace

customer_reviews.title: And cleanup is so fast and easy. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These pans are fabulous. Cook evenly. No stick. And cleanup is so fast and easy. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline D. Battin

customer_reviews.title: copper chef
customer_reviews.text: just wish at this price they came w/ lids over all great pan's so far only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: verlyn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, the food get sticky and very difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible,the food get sticky and very difficult to clean,I have to scratch the mess
customer_reviews.author: Julia V.

customer_reviews.title: Non stick, no oil needed , not evenly cooked.:(
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't heat evenly, only the center will e hot and the rest will not, so you have to rotate whatever you out in, as to cook it evenly. And that's why I gave it 3 starts. NOTHIMG stick to eat and it is easy to clean, no oil needed, which is why it deserves a five, but the fact that it doesn't disperse the heat driv s me crazy
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love Copper Chef
customer_reviews.text: Really love the small fry pan. Had to buy the set to get the one I wanted, but will probably use the bigger one sometimes. Small one is just right for one person. I can scramble 3 eggs with no problem. Use this pan almost daily. Copper Chef should make smaller sizes of their other products for single people or those who use a small oven.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Skillets
customer_reviews.text: Love these skillets!!! Easy to clean! Just the right size. I purchased this brand before. My set didn’t come with small skillets. Glad I found these because I use this size more often. Make sure not add butter when using or, it will harm the coating. Read instructions throughly before using.
customer_reviews.author: Aundria Haywood

customer_reviews.title: not very happy about
customer_reviews.text: Larger Pan retains water inside the handle after washing, not very happy about that
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M.

customer_reviews.title: Best frying pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this frying pan. It doesn't require any butter or oil (but you can add a dab for flavor if you desire). Nothing sticks and I just wipe it with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Butchko

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Yes love cooking with these pans. I've thrown all my other pants away and brought more if these. Just like the commercial easy to cook & clean. Eggs slide right out the pan. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TRACINA LEAKE

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pans.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. My favorite pans. Clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: judy richardson

customer_reviews.title: " She's a killer cook and a "foodie" so THIS is a good
customer_reviews.text: My wife says the "best pans she's ever had." She's a killer cook and a "foodie" so THIS is a good review
customer_reviews.author: Ed S

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled
customer_reviews.text: This hair blower dries FASTer than any I've ever had! Great heat/cool options.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P. Tapp

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Had one before and used it all the time to fry eggs. Bought the combo pack and love them
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these copper pans so much that I also give them as gifts!!!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend who was excited to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Southern NM

customer_reviews.title: Love them nothing sticks and cooks very evenly
customer_reviews.text: Everything we wanted. Love them nothing sticks and cooks very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not like cooking eggs in the pan as it still sticks ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not like cooking eggs in the pan as it still sticks and does not cook them properly. Also don't like that I have to use special utensils. And not supposed to use olive oil for cooking and that's all that I use
customer_reviews.author: Gale Van Landuyt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans. Love copper chef, truly a great non-stick pan. I just wish they came with lids!
customer_reviews.author: Libby Mayea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our cooking delight. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DL  OKC

customer_reviews.title: Ordered MORE!
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes them so much we ordered the set with the induction hot plate. Can't say more than that!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Brassard

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Love these cocking pans. I use them all the time. You just have to remember to cure them at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R. Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: like the pans just a little small but serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: chyrisse seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Love love these fry pans
customer_reviews.text: Love love these fry pans!! Just right size for the 2 of us. Cooks fast and clean up is nothing!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they seem fine.
customer_reviews.text: They heat up really fast. I basically use the 8 inch for omelets and for that it works really well. I use the 9.5 inch for frying small steaks and chops. The 9.5 inch doesn't always come out of the dishwasher clean and needs to be hand washed and occasionally needs to be cleaned with the scouring pad. I've only had them a few weeks. I don't expect the larger one to last. For light use, they seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using these pan so much that my two sisters and my best friend have started buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Jennings

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: these items returned can't rate them since they were returned
customer_reviews.author: Rich  Smith

product_meta.title: Copper Chef Fry Pan 8 and 9.5 Inch (2 Pack), 8 & 9.5
product_meta.description: Riveted handles • strong & durable • oven safe Ceramic-Tech non-stick coating • nothing sticks to the pan • cook healthy without butter, oils & chemicals (no PTFE & PFOA) • heat resistant up to 850° stainless steel induction plate • Provides rapid even heat distribution • perfect for all cooking surfaces
feature_bullets: 2 Pack- Copper Chef 8" and 9.5" Square Fry Pan
CeramiTech non-stick coating allows for easy clean up. Cook without butter or oil
The Stainless Steel Induction Plate means no hot spots. Allowing for fast, even cooking.
2 1/4 Inch Deep fry pan 100% Safe: PFOA, PTFE
